## MFAContainer.activateOOB() method

Activates out-of-band (OOB) MFA authenticator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
activateOOB(code: string): Promise<ActivateOOBResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  code | <code>string</code> | MFA code |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<ActivateOOBResult>`
